original_text: Jesus grew up into a man. He became strong and he could understand more and more things. God was pleased with him, and people were pleased with him too.
korean_text: 예수는 지혜와 키가 자라가며 하나님과 사람에게 더욱 사랑스러워 가시더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus grew up into a man
and he could understand more and more things
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 점점 더 많은 것을 이해할 수 있었다

sentences.original_text: and people were pleased with him too
